title: Marco
content: Marco is a high-intensity action-thriller following the titular character Marco, played by Unni Mukundan, who returns from Italy to seek vengeance for the brutal murder of his adopted brother, Victor. Before his death, Victor, a blind man, identifies his killer, Russell Isaac. Marco embarks on a violent mission for justice, facing betrayals and tragedies along the way. The film concludes with a bloody showdown, leaving room for a possible sequel​​.

acf_fields.post_summary: Marco is a high-intensity action-thriller following the titular character Marco, played by Unni Mukundan, who returns from Italy to seek vengeance for the brutal murder of his adopted brother, Victor. Before his death, Victor, a blind man, identifies his killer, Russell Isaac. Marco embarks on a violent mission for justice, facing betrayals and tragedies along the way. The film concludes with a bloody showdown, leaving room for a possible sequel​.
acf_fields.regions_availability: India (Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, and Hindi versions)
acf_fields.awards_&_nominations: No confirmed awards or nominations yet
acf_fields.production_house: Cubes Entertainments in association with Unni Mukundan Films
acf_fields.seo_search_question_1: When will Marco be available on OTT?
acf_fields.seo_search_answer_1: Marco started streaming on SonyLIV on February 14, 2025.
acf_fields.seo_search_question_2: Who is the director of Marco?
acf_fields.seo_search_answer_2: Marco is directed by Haneef Adeni.
acf_fields.seo_search_question_3: What is the box office collection of Marco?
acf_fields.seo_search_answer_3: The film grossed over ₹115 crore worldwide, making it the highest-grossing A-rated Malayalam film.

title: Baby John
content: The movie follows Baby John, an ex-cop who left behind his violent past to raise his daughter in peace. However, when his enemies resurface, he is forced to return to action to protect his child. The film is an emotional blend of action, drama, and suspense.

acf_fields.post_summary: An action-packed Bollywood film featuring high-energy sequences, emotional father-daughter moments, and a powerful storyline​.
acf_fields.awards_&_nominations: Not available yet, as the movie is yet to release.
acf_fields.production_house: Jio Studios, Cine1 Studios, A for Apple Productions.
acf_fields.seo_search_question_1: When will Baby John release in theaters?
acf_fields.seo_search_answer_1: Baby John is scheduled for a theatrical release on December 25, 2024.
acf_fields.seo_search_question_2: Who is the lead actor in Baby John?
acf_fields.seo_search_answer_2: Varun Dhawan plays the lead role, supported by Keerthy Suresh, Wamiqa Gabbi, and Jackie Shroff.
acf_fields.seo_search_question_3: Where can I watch Baby John online?
acf_fields.seo_search_answer_3: After its theatrical release, Baby John is expected to stream on Amazon Prime Video.
